source:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_00<tab>The poor-heeled youth is visibly vexed.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ウルダハの羽振りがよくない若者は、話を聞いてほしいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_01<tab>In Ul'dah you come across a poor-heeled youth, who has recently suffered a string of losses at the Gold Saucer's Lord of Verminion game. The youth tells you of the time and dedication he put towards building his minion army, only to have it soundly defeated over and over again by a mysterious newcomer, who possessed minions the likes of which he had never seen before. The youth accused his opponent of cheating, only to be told that the newfangled minions were sanctioned for use in the arena. Wallowing in his defeat, the poor-heeled youth claims to have had enough, and mutters that you can see the man's peculiar minions for yourself if you go to the Gold Saucer.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

羽振りがよくない若者から、謎のミニオン使いについての話を聞いた。その秘密を知りたければ、ゴールドソーサーに行き「異邦の社長」と話してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_02<tab>At the Gold Saucer, you come across a well-dressed Au Ra who fits the description given by the peevish man in Ul'dah, and sure enough by his side is a jaunty scarlet cat with flaming twin tails. The Au Ra acknowledges your presence, but says he is otherwise occupied. However, he soon changes his mind when he realizes you are an adventurer and presents you with a proposition; he will tell you more about his scarlet cat if you are able to help him. You accept and he introduces himself as the wandering executive, so called as he travels often from the company he manages in his homeland. The wandering executive asks you to locate his traveling companion, who he fears has gotten lost on his way to the Gold Saucer. He informs you that the Black Shroud was the last place they were together before his friend scampered off on his own. He then suggests you begin your investigation into his friend's whereabouts at Bentbranch, where some of the locals may have seen him.
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_02<tab>異邦の社長と話した。どうやら彼は、エオルゼアの外から、ともだちといっしょに旅をしてきたらしい。しかし、そのともだちと黒衣森ではぐれてしまったのだという。中央森林のベントブランチ牧場に行き、白くて、丸っこくて、フワフワと浮いている、おしゃべりなヤツに関する目撃情報を集めよう。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_03<tab>You arrive at Bentbranch and ask the locals whether they saw someone fitting the traveling companion's description: round, white, floats in the air, and very talkative. While two of the people you questioned seem to think you mean the moogles of the Twelveswood, one of the hands at the chocobo stables mentions a more promising lead. Aethelthryth tells you there was talk in Gridania about an unnatural being that was sealed away near the Guardian Tree by Seedseer O-App-Pesi, for fear of it corrupting the forest. Head towards the Guardian Tree to see if there are any traces of the supernatural being.
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_03<tab>聞き込みを行った結果、いくつかの情報を得た。どうやら、角尊のオ・アパ・ペシが「白い怪異」と戦ったらしい。中央森林の長老の木にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA08201 /var>」を調べよう。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_04<tab>You come upon an ancient stone vessel, which sits idle underneath the Guardian Tree. Confident that the vessel is the same one that O-App-Pesi employed to confine the being, you hold your breath and release what the Padjals took great pains to seal away. You find yourself lost for words as a fast-talking, floating white creature pops out and introduces himself as Whisper, a Yo-kai. As a reward for freeing him, Whisper bestows upon you a vibrantly colored Yo-kai Watch, which he says will allow you to encounter Yo-kai such as himself. Despite his good intentions, Whisper admits that the watch is broken, but can be easily repaired by his friend. You wait patiently for the sprightly soul to take a breath before mentioning the wandering executive, and he confirms that he is indeed the missing friend that the Au Ra was waiting for at the Gold Saucer. Furthermore, Whisper tells you that upon arrival, the executive might be able to repair the motionless timepiece you received. Depart for the Gold Saucer without further delay to ensure that Whisper returns to his travel party safely.
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_04<tab>古代の石壺から、「ウィスパー」と名乗る妖怪が現れ、お礼の品をもらった。しかし、もらった「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1C01 /var>」は故障しているらしい。ゴールドソーサーに戻り、「異邦の社長」に報告しつつ、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1C01 /var>」を渡して修理してもらおう。

source:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive at the Gold Saucer to see Whisper safely reunited, and the wandering executive apprised of what happened to the specter. Whisper also appears to have mentioned the Yo-kai Watch to the wandering executive, who gladly repairs it for you. Gratified for finding his traveling companion, the wandering executive proceeds to fulfill his end of the deal. He explains that the “minions” he brought with him are Yo-kai like Whisper. Asking you to call him by his real name, Nohi, he then gladly offers his services to introduce you to the supernatural creatures and his cache of exotic weapons, in exchange for Yo-kai Medals scattered about the realm. Could this be the beginning of a beautiful friendship?

Yo-kai Medals can be obtained by participating in FATEs in the following areas while equipped with the Yo-kai Watch:
The Black Shroud: Central, East, South, and North
La Noscea: Middle, Lower, Western, Upper, and Outer
Thanalan: Central, Western, Eastern, and Southern

Legendary Medals can be obtained, albeit at a low probability, in FATEs in areas designated in the Yo-kai Medallium while accompanied by the Yo-kai minion designated on the medal.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SEQ_05<tab>異邦の社長とウィスパーは、無事に再会できていた。さらに「妖怪ウォッチ」を修理してもらうこともできた。彼がいうには、特定の条件を満たした状態で、各地で事件や問題を解決すると「妖怪メダル」や「妖怪レジェンドメダル」が手に入るという。これらのアイテムを集めてくれば、ともだちになれる妖怪や、彼の会社がデザインした武器と交換してくれるらしい。積極的に集めてみよう。
「妖怪メダル」は「妖怪ウォッチ」を装備した状態で、各地のF.A.T.E.を達成し、貢献することで得られる。対象地域は、中央ラノシア、低地ラノシア、西ラノシア、高地ラノシア、外地ラノシア、黒衣森:中央森林、東部森林、南部森林、北部森林、西ザナラーン、中央ザナラーン、東ザナラーン、南ザナラーン、クルザス西部高地、アバラシア雲海、高地ドラヴァニア、ドラヴァニア雲海、低地ドラヴァニア、魔大陸アジス・ラー、ギラバニア辺境地帯、ギラバニア山岳地帯、ギラバニア湖畔地帯、紅玉海、ヤンサ、アジムステップの合計25地域。「妖怪レジェンドメダル」は、特定の妖怪ミニオンを連れた状態で、「妖怪大辞典」に記載された地域のF.A.T.E.を達成し、貢献することで稀に得られる。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the wandering executive at the Gold Saucer.
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_TODO_00<tab>ゴールドソーサーの異邦の社長と話す

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_TODO_01<tab>Gather information at Bentbranch Meadows.
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_TODO_01<tab>ベントブランチ牧場で情報を集める

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_TODO_02<tab>Investigate the area near the Guardian Tree.
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_TODO_02<tab>長老の木の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA08201 /var>を調べる

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the Yo-kai Watch to the wandering executive.
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_TODO_03<tab>異邦の社長に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1C01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_001<tab>Argh, how could I have lost? My strategy was foolproof! Listen, friend, if you have an inclination towards that Lord of Verminion game at the Gold Saucer, I'd say you'd best think twice.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_001<tab>聞いてくれよ、俺のツイてない話を……。
負けたんだ……コテンパンに、負けたんだよ！
何って、「ロード・オブ・ヴァーミニオン」の勝負の話さ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_002<tab>I spent a fortune on my critters, and had scores of victories to boast. Then some <var 1A 02 /var>newcomer<var 1A 01 /var> waltzed up and challenged me. I knew there was something strange about him─an Au Ra with hair of vibrant hue, glint in his eye, called himself the “maundering executive” or some such.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_002<tab>ミニオンを使ったゲームなんだけど、俺はそれが得意でね。
見知らぬ「異邦の社長」に勝負を挑まれたから対戦したんだ。
実力の差を見せつけてやろうって意気込んでな……。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_003<tab>Still, I'm not one to turn down a match, novice or veteran. Hells, I even gave him a head start. But the minions he used, they weren't like any I've ever seen before! They were <var 1A 02 /var>demons<var 1A 01 /var>, I tell you!
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_003<tab>ところが、根っからのマニアである俺でさえ、
見たことも聞いたこともないミニオンを次々と出してきて……。
ズタボロに負けちまったよ……。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_004<tab>I accused him of cheating, but he said he had petitioned the Gold Saucer to use them for battle...and the little buggers were approved! Needless to say, my beloved team was torn to shreds every time.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_004<tab>もし謎のミニオンに興味があるって言うなら、
「ゴールドソーサー」に行ってみるんだな。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_005<tab>Seems like anything qualifies these days. I've completely lost my appetite for the game, but if you're curious about these so-called minions, you should head over to the Gold Saucer and take a look yourself. He was still loitering around there when I left.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_005<tab>何か困ったことがあるとかで、腕利きの冒険者を探していたから、
「異邦の社長」に声をかけて相談に乗ってやるといい。
謎のミニオンについて、秘密を教えてくれるかもしれないぞ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_006<tab>...That blank stare tells me you have no idea what I've been rambling on about. I'd give you a ticket if I had a spare. Hmmm... My well-heeled brother tends to flaunt his winnings around here, and he usually has more than a few on hand. See if he can't help you out.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_006<tab>あぁ、そうだ……「ゴールドソーサー」に行ったことがないなら、
その辺りにいる「羽振りがいい若者」に声をかけてみな。
たぶん、チケットをもらえるはずだからさ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_010<tab>And that red monstrosity... I've never seen a cat like it. Where in the seven hells did he get it?
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_LOSER02141_000_010<tab>クソッ……何者なんだ、異邦の社長……。
あの赤いネコっぽいミニオン……どうやったら手に入るんだ！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_020<tab>Can I help you? Ah, I suppose word has gotten around about this little fellow. I would be delighted to tell you about him, truly, but I'm afraid I'm preoccupied at the moment. I'm waiting for someone who is unreasonably late.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_020<tab>ん……なんだい？
オレが連れているミニオンが気になるって？

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_021<tab>Wait...now that I think about it, you're an adventurer, aren't you? Alternatively, I may have a proposition for you.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_021<tab>なるほど、どうやらキミは冒険者のようだね。
もしもオレの頼みを、ひとつ聞いてくれたなら、
キミが知りたがっているコトを教えてあげてもいいよ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_022<tab>If you help me out, I will tell you more about my feline friend here. Do you accept?
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_022<tab>なぁに、そんなに身構えなくても大丈夫！
キミの実力なら、問題なく解決できるはずだからね。
で、どうするんだい？　オレからの提案を受けてくれるかい？

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_Q1_000_000<tab>Accept the executive's proposition?
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_Q1_000_000<tab>提案を受ける？

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_A1_000_001<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_A1_000_001<tab>はい

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_A1_000_002<tab>No
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_A1_000_002<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_024<tab>Well, you can't blame me for trying. Good day to you, then.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_024<tab>そうかい、残念だね。
まぁ、気が向いたらまた声をかけてくれよ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_025<tab>And the deal is struck. Allow me to introduce myself.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_025<tab>よし、それじゃあ、決まりだな。
あらためて自己紹介をさせてくれ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_026<tab>I am a tradesman come from far beyond the borders of Eorzea. Though I am a slave to wanderlust, I occasionally return to my homeland where I manage a sizable company that deals in eccentric commodities. Thus the locals called me “the wandering executive,” and I wear the title with pride.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_026<tab>オレはエオルゼアの外から旅して来た者でね。
故郷では、とある会社の社長をしているものだから、
皆からは「異邦の社長」なんて呼ばれているよ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_027<tab>I am often accompanied by an erudite traveling companion, but he appears to have gotten quite lost on this journey. We were strolling in the twilight of the Black Shroud when he grew excited and scampered off to do some sightseeing of his own.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_027<tab>その故郷から、
いっしょに旅をしてきたともだちと、はぐれてしまってね。
迷子になっている彼を、探してきてほしいんだよ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_028<tab>He was aware I had some affairs to take care of here, so I thought to let him enjoy himself while I finished with my tasks and stayed in one spot. But he hasn't shown up in hours. Perhaps you could ask around Bentbranch for me and find out what's keeping him?
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_028<tab>白くて、丸っこくて、フワフワと浮いている、
おしゃべりなヤツだから、見ればすぐわかるはずさ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_029<tab>Oh, I almost forgot to mention. My friend is not of my tribe. He's a rotund little soul, white as snow and floats through the air like a cloud...except if clouds could speak I would hope they wouldn't be as long-winded as he.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_029<tab>はぐれたのは、黒衣森にある「ベントブランチ牧場」のあたりだ。
目立つヤツだから、目撃者を探せば見つかると思うんだが……。
それじゃ、いいかんじによろしく～！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_030<tab>You ask my real name? My apologies, but you must understand I cannot reveal that so readily to someone I barely know in a strange land. If you'll help me by finding my friend, perhaps I will tell it to you.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_030<tab>オレの名前が知りたいって？
まだキミとは知り合ったばかりじゃないか。
とにかく、まかせたともだち捜しの件、よろしく～！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_KEITHA_000_040<tab>Round, white, and floats through the air? Are you sure it's a <var 1A 02 /var>person<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_KEITHA_000_040<tab>えっ、人探しをしているですって？
白くて、丸っこくて、フワフワと浮いている、
おしゃべりなヤツを！？

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_KEITHA_000_041<tab>'Cause I'd say you're searchin' for one o' them moogles. In any case, you'd be out of luck since they only appear when they want to be seen.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_KEITHA_000_041<tab>それってもしかして「モーグリ族」のことでしょうか。
でも、彼らって姿を隠す魔法が、とっても上手だから、
ほとんど見ることができないんですよね……。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_KEITHA_000_045<tab>I wish I could meet 'em, too! Chocobo chicks have lots of feathered fluff, but I bet nothin' could compare with cuddlin' a moogle.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_KEITHA_000_045<tab>またモーグリ族に会いたいです。
白くて、フワフワで、すごく可愛いんですよ！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_GIAHMOLKOH_000_050<tab>That sounds like a moogle, sure enough. Quiet as a mouse when they're hiding, but once they reveal themselves they never stop chattering. The one I saw a few nights ago was hundreds of yalms away and I could still hear his voice.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_GIAHMOLKOH_000_050<tab>なんだって、白くてフワフワのうるさいヤツを探してる？
あぁ、それなら、おそらくモーグリ族だろう。
数日前に見かけたことがある。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_GIAHMOLKOH_000_051<tab>I was peering off into the distance between the boughs of the trees, when I sighted a well-dressed Au Ra traveler, with fiery violet hair and a moogle flying beside him. It was a strange sight if I do say so myself.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_GIAHMOLKOH_000_051<tab>赤髪が特徴的な、アウラ族の旅人の周囲を、
まとわりつくように飛んでいるのを見かけたぞ。
もっとも遠くから見かけただけで、どこに行ったかは知らんがな。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_GIAHMOLKOH_000_055<tab>Granted, I never saw a moogle myself before this instance, but it most assuredly was one.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_GIAHMOLKOH_000_055<tab>モーグリ族を見る機会は稀だが、
噂通り、白くて、丸っこくて、フワフワしていたから、
おそらく間違いないと思うぞ……。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_AETHELTHRYTH_000_060<tab>Haven't seen anything like that, but it seems too coincidental that there was talk in Gridania recently about an unnatural being that was disturbing the elementals.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_AETHELTHRYTH_000_060<tab>白くて、丸っこくて、宙を浮いてるヤツですって！？
そんな奇妙な生き物は、見たことないわ……。
でも、ちょっと心当たりがあるの。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_AETHELTHRYTH_000_061<tab>The Padjals were saying they've never seen a spirit like it, and feared it would taint the Twelveswood. Seedseer O-App-Pesi himself sealed it away near the Guardian Tree.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_AETHELTHRYTH_000_061<tab>グリダニアに行った時に、小耳に挟んだのだけれど、
角尊のオ・アパ・ペシ様が「白い怪異」と戦われたそうよ。
「長老の木」の辺りに追い詰めて、石壺に封印したって聞いたわ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_AETHELTHRYTH_000_065<tab>The Padjals said O-App-Pesi actually struggled to contain the thing, despite being well versed in unnatural phenomena in the forest. What was the word they used to describe it? Slippery?
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_AETHELTHRYTH_000_065<tab>オ・アパ・ペシ様は、グリダニアでも指折りの幻術士よ。
謎の「白い怪異」を封印するなんて、さすがよね。
興味があるなら「長老の木」の様子を見て来たらどう？

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>A gentle breeze rustles the leaves of the Guardian Tree as the antiquated stone vessel sits unmoving underneath. Nevertheless, you cannot help but feel a shiver up your spine.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>長老の木の根元に、古代の石壺が置いてある。
石壺からは、異様な気配を感じる……。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_Q2_000_000<tab>Open the stone vessel?
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_Q2_000_000<tab>古代の石壺を開ける？

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_A2_000_001<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_A2_000_001<tab>はい

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_A2_000_002<tab>No
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_A2_000_002<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_100_000<tab>Ahhh, you have freed me! Much appreciated, much appreciated indeed! But where are my manners? Whisper, at your service! I am a Yo-kai, a supernatural being!
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_100_000<tab>ワタクシの名前は「ウィスパー」。
妖怪でうぃす！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_073<tab>I know, I know. You are wondering why I was in that spooky stone capsule. I was floating along, taking in the scenery when night fell and I lost sight of the path. I wandered until I came across a small boy and asked him how to return to Bentbranch.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_073<tab>時をさかのぼること数日前……。
森の中をさまよっていたワタクシは、
通りすがりのお坊さんに、道を尋ねようと声をかけたのです。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_074<tab>But that self-righteous horned child declared me an unnatural presence in the forest, and locked me away! Oh, I was so horribly cramped!
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_074<tab>ところが、その「角の生えたお坊さん」は、
ワタクシを悪霊だと決めつけ、この石の壺に封印したのです！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_075<tab>Why would he do such a thing to an innocent visitor of his lands? I never said I was an <var 1A 02 /var>evil<var 1A 01 /var> supernatural being. I was defenseless, I tell you. Utterly defenseless! Unwary! Vulnerable!
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_075<tab>なんということでしょう！
ひどい、ひどすぎます！！　ドッカンコーッ！！！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_076<tab>Aaanyway, I happen to come from a tribe of Yo-kai who know how to reward their liberators properly, and therefore, I have a gift to bestow upon you, my new corporeal friend. Here!
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_076<tab>とにかく、助けていただいたお礼をしなければ……。
フフ、アナタにこれを差し上げましょう！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_077<tab>That impressive device is a called a Yo-kai Watch. It will allow you to encounter other supernatural beings like myself! With that on your wrist, the mundane will become magnificent! Oh, the unbelievable things you'll see with that watch!
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_077<tab>それは「妖怪ウォッチ」！
それを身につければ、アンビリーバボー！
とってもイイことがあるのです！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_078<tab>...If it weren't broken. Now, now, do not think I would give my savior a watch <var 1A 02 /var>entirely<var 1A 01 /var> beyond repair. It's just that I had not found someone worthy enough for a long time. My friend had been meaning to take a look at it, but─
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_078<tab>とはいえ、少しばかり故障しているようでしてね。
ワタクシのおともだちであれば、修理できるはずなのですが、
数日前にはぐれたばかりでして……。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_079<tab>Yes, that's him all right! He sent you to rescue me? Splendid, splendid! So he was waiting for me at the Gold Saucer, was he? Had I not gotten lost and put in my precarious position, I surely would have set off for the desert at once.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_079<tab>なななんと！
その赤髪の「社長」にたのまれて、ワタクシをさがしていたと？
その方こそ、ワタクシのおともだちに間違いありません！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_080<tab>Let us depart without delay! If you give the watch to him when we arrive, I am sure he will repair it for you. And <var 1A 02 /var>then<var 1A 01 /var> it will allow you to encounter unbelievable beings like myself!
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_080<tab>それではさっそく、
その「ゴールドソーサー」とやらに行ってみましょう。
きっと「妖怪ウォッチ」も修理してもらえるはずでうぃす～！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_081<tab>Whew, we've reached the Gold Saucer at last! Now would be the opportune moment to present my pal with that stylish Yo-kai Watch I conferred upon you. He'll find a way to mend it in no time since he's a creator─er, a creative sort!
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_081<tab>その節は、お世話になりました。
無事に神……じゃなくて、おともだちに会えましたよ！
ほんとうに助かりました、うぃす！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_090<tab>Whisper explained everything that transpired. What luck you were able to find my friend. Had you not, I would have never known he had been sealed inside that vessel! You have my sincerest gratitude.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_090<tab>やあ！　無事にともだちの「ウィスパー」と再会できたよ！
どうやら、キミが見つけてくれたみたいだね。
ありがとう、ほんとうに助かったよ！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_091<tab>He told me you have something to show me as well?
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_091<tab>ん……ソレを修理してほしいだって？
どれどれ、見せてくれ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_092<tab>Ah, I see. So he decided to give you the Yo-kai Watch. ...A broken Yo-kai Watch, rather.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_092<tab>あぁ、コレは「妖怪ウォッチ」だね。
確かに少しばかり壊れているようだ……。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_093<tab>However, there's no need to worry. Whatever my spirited companion did to it appears to be completely reparable. Wait a moment while I get out my tools.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_093<tab>でも、大丈夫！
この程度の故障なら、カンタンになおせるからさ！
それじゃあ、ちょっとまっていてくれ！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_094<tab>Mmmhm... Yes, I see... Unjam the slot... Set that hand back a couple of ticks... Polish up the face and...
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_094<tab>うんうん！　ここを、こうして……！
ヒョォオオオオオ！！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_095<tab>Success! Your watch is now in excellent shape. Go on, take it!
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_095<tab>よしよし、絶好調！　完璧に修理できたよ！
さあ、受け取ってくれ！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_096<tab>And a bargain is a bargain. You wished to know more about my mysterious minions, yes?
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_096<tab>あぁ、それから……確かキミは、
オレが連れているミニオンが気になっていたんだよね？

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_097<tab>I'm certain Whisper mentioned the Yo-kai to you. I brought a handful of these supernatural beings with me from my homeland. Like Whisper, this feisty feline is also a Yo-kai, but from a different tribe.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_097<tab>もうわかっていると思うけど、
彼らはウィスパーと同じ「妖怪」なんだ。
オレが故郷から連れて来たんだけどね。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_098<tab>Some Yo-kai grow to be quite friendly once they get to know you. Others, however, are mischievous, and to blame for otherwise inexplicable happenings. If you wish, I can introduce you to the more affable ones I've brought.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_098<tab>もしキミが「妖怪メダル」というモノを、
集めて来てくれたら、オレが「妖怪」を紹介してあげるよ。
ともだちになれば、きっとミニオンとして召喚できるはずさ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_099<tab>Should the Yo-kai warm up to you, they become stalwart allies who you can summon to fight at your command...well, at the Gold Saucer anyway. But there is a slight caveat. I cannot accept Eorzean currency for my services; I deal primarily in Yo-kai Medals.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_099<tab>「妖怪メダル」は、「妖怪ウォッチ」を身につけた状態で、
各地で発生している事件や問題を解決したときに、
手に入ることがあるんだ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_100<tab>I'm feeling generous since you helped me retrieve Whisper, so I'll give you one for free. To obtain more, well, that's where your Yo-kai Watch will come in handy. Should you chance upon certain <var 1A 02 /var>fate<var 1A 01 /var>-ful happenings, put the watch on your wrist and you shall be rewarded for your meritorious deeds.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_100<tab>そうだ、今回のお礼代わりに、
「妖怪メダル」1枚をプレゼントしよう。
ともだちになりたい妖怪を決めたら、オレに声をかけてくれ！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_101<tab>In addition to the Yo-kai, I also brought other wares which may interest an adventurer like you: exotic weapons, specially designed by the fine artisans of my company. We accept Legendary Medals as payment for these weapons.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_101<tab>あぁ、それともうひとつ……「妖怪大辞典」もわたしておこう。
妖怪たちのヒミツや、「妖怪メダル」よりも貴重な、
「妖怪レジェンドメダル」の入手方法が記されているぞ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_102<tab>Here. Should our weapons suit your tastes, this Yo-kai Medallium will prove useful in explaining where you can obtain the necessary Legendary Medals for each weapon. A bit of an inconvenience, I know, but I would be a terrible businessman if I simply gave our wares away for free.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_102<tab>「妖怪レジェンドメダル」を集めてくれば、
ウチの社員がデザインしたカッコイイ武器と交換してあげよう！
タダであげたいところだけど、これもビジネスだからね！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_103<tab>Whew...Whisper's long-windedness is starting to rub off on me. Feel free to speak with me about the Yo-kai or the weapons at your leisure. I still have a few loose ends to tie up here at the Gold Saucer, so trust that I won't be wandering for a while.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_103<tab>おっと、話が長くなってしまったな……。
詳しい説明が聞きたいなら、いつでもオレに話しかけてくれ。
しばらく、ここに滞在してエオルゼアを満喫するつもりだからさ。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_104<tab>Oh, and my real name is...Nohi. Yes, Nohi. Glad to finally make your acquaintance.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_HINOSHIN_000_104<tab>さて、もうこれで、オレとキミもともだちだな！
気軽に「ノッヒー」と呼んでくれよ！
これからも、よろしくな！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_105<tab>Yo-kai Medals are a symbol of entering a sacred bond. More than a friendship, more than a <var 1A 02 /var>marriage<var 1A 01 /var>! With the Yo-kai Watch, you will be able to gain those medals. I told you that it would allow you to encounter unbelievable beings, didn't I?
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_WHISPER_000_105<tab>いやはや、何から何までお世話になりました！
ぜひとも「妖怪ウォッチ」を使って、たくさんの妖怪と、
ともだちになりましょう！　うぃす！

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>Yo-kai Medals can be obtained by completing FATEs while equipped with the Yo-kai Watch.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>「妖怪メダル」は、「妖怪ウォッチ」を装備した状態で、
各地のF.A.T.E.を達成し、貢献した場合に入手できます。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_100_110<tab>Yo-kai Medals can be found at FATEs in the following areas:
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_100_110<tab>対象地域は、中央ラノシア、低地ラノシア、
西ラノシア、高地ラノシア、外地ラノシア、
黒衣森:中央森林、東部森林、南部森林、北部森林……。

source:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_200_110<tab>The Black Shroud: Central, East, South, and North
La Noscea: Middle, Lower, Western, Upper, and Outer
Thanalan: Central, Western, Eastern, and Southern
Coerthas Western Highlands, the Sea of Clouds, the Dravanian Forelands, the Churning Mists, and the Dravanian Hinterlands
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_200_110<tab>西ザナラーン、中央ザナラーン、東ザナラーン、
南ザナラーン、クルザス西部高地、アバラシア雲海、
高地ドラヴァニア、ドラヴァニア雲海、低地ドラヴァニア……。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_300_110<tab>Azys Lla, the Fringes, the Peaks, the Lochs, the Ruby Sea, Yanxia, the Azim Steppe
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_300_110<tab>魔大陸アジス・ラー、ギラバニア辺境地帯、ギラバニア山岳地帯、
ギラバニア湖畔地帯、紅玉海、ヤンサ、アジムステップとなります。
積極的にF.A.T.E.に参加して、集めてみましょう。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_000_111<tab>Legendary Medals can be obtained, albeit at a low probability, by participating in FATEs in areas designated in the Yo-kai Medallium while accompanied by the Yo-kai minion designated on the medal.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_000_111<tab>また「妖怪レジェンドメダル」は、妖怪ミニオンを連れた状態で、
特定の地域のF.A.T.E.を達成し、貢献すると稀に入手できます。
「妖怪大辞典」で指定された地域を確認し、挑戦してみましょう。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_100_111<tab>The Yo-kai Medallium can be accessed from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collection<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> menu or the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Minion Guide<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_100_111<tab>「妖怪大辞典」は、
「だいじなもの」か「ミニオンリスト」から、
開くことができます。

source: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_000_112<tab>
target: TEXT_FESYKW001_02141_SYSTEM_000_112<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
